meanings.definition: A plan or drawing produced to show the look and function or workings of a building, garment, or other object before it is built or made.
meanings.sent1: The architect created a detailed design of the new house.
meanings.sent2: She studied the design of the dress before sewing it.
meanings.sent3: The design of the cake was so intricate that it looked like a piece of art.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas where the design of her dreams took shape.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.

meanings.definition: Purpose, planning, or intention that exists or is thought to exist behind an action, fact, or material object.
meanings.sent1: The teacher had a clear design for the class project.
meanings.sent2: His design to surprise his friend with a gift was successful.
meanings.sent3: The design behind the prank was to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Love was the design that connected their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The design of the plan ensured its success.
